message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $1,200,000. Considering its exceptional quality and unique benefits, I believe it would be an invaluable asset to you. I am offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special price of $1,150,000. This offer is designed to ensure that you receive a significant benefit while also allowing me to maximize the return on our investment. I trust that we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of our interests. Please let me know your thoughts on this proposal.
